#List of parameters for SPLATCHE3

###Parameters linked to filenames

PopDensityFile=./SPLATCHE3_CentralEuropeSimulation/dens_init_europe.txt
PresVegetationFile=./SPLATCHE3_CentralEuropeSimulation/EuropeFinal.asc
Veg2KFile=./SPLATCHE3_CentralEuropeSimulation/dynamic_K.txt
Veg2FFile=./SPLATCHE3_CentralEuropeSimulation/dynamic_F.txt

###Parameters linked to demographic simulations

ChosenDemographicModel=1
EndTime=1600
GenerationTime=25
GrowthRate=0.4
MigrationRate=0.25
AllowSourcePopulationOverflow=0
TauValue=200
AncestralSize=5000
ArrivalCellFile=./SPLATCHE3_CentralEuropeSimulation/Arrival_cell.col

###Parameters linked to physical environment

FrictionChoice=0
RealBPTime=-40000
RiverFrictionChangeFactor=1
RiverCarCapChangeFactor=1
CoastFrictionChangeFactor=1
CoastCarCapChangeFactor=1

###Parameters linked to genetic simulations

SampleFile=./SPLATCHE3_CentralEuropeSimulation/CE_NE_BA_HG.sam
GeneticFile=./SPLATCHE3_CentralEuropeSimulation/MitochondrialDNA.par
NumGeneticSimulations=1
GenotypicData=0
MaxNumGenerations=10000
NexusFile=0
GenealogiesFile=0
ImmigDistrFile=0

###Parameters linked to double layers

DoublePopulationMode=0
ChosenDemographicModel_P2=23
GrowthRate_P2=0.2
MigrationRate_P2=0.15
MigrRate_P1_to_P2=0
MigrRate_P2_to_P1=0
Veg2K_P2_File=./SPLATCHE3_CentralEuropeSimulation/dynamic_K2.txt
Veg2F_P2_File=./SPLATCHE3_CentralEuropeSimulation/dynamic_F2.txt
PropFile=0

###Parameters linked to various other outputs

GenerateOutputMigrationBMP=0
GenerateOutputMDensityBMP=0
GenerateOutputOccupationBMP=0
GenerateOutputMigrationASCII=0
GenerateOutputMDensityASCII=0
GenerateOutputOccupationASCII=0

### Miscelaneous Parameters

AllowShortIntForNumberOfIndividuals=1
